articles.content: This is one of the first Cyber Monday deals I've seen for 2024 that beats its Black Friday counterpart. Lenovo has just dropped the price of the Bose QuietComfort wireless noise cancelling headphones… [+3814 chars]

articles.title: Huawei’s Mate 70 sales affected by ‘modest’ chip, no Android support: analysts - South China Morning Post

articles.content: Sales of Huawei Technologies latest flagship Mate 70-seriessmartphones are expected to fall short of the demand generated by the Mate 60, according to analysts, citing the new models weaker processor… [+1413 chars]
